<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/gadgets/proxy?url=http://bootstrap-listpicker.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/css/bootstrap.min.css" /> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/gadgets/proxy?url=http://bootstrap-listpicker.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/css/bootstrap-listpicker.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" src="/gadgets/proxy?url=http://bootstrap-listpicker.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/jquery-1.8.2.min.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="/gadgets/proxy?url=http://bootstrap-listpicker.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/bootstrap.min.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="/gadgets/proxy?url=http://bootstrap-listpicker.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/jquery.input-clear.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript" src="/gadgets/proxy?url=http://bootstrap-listpicker.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/js/bootstrap-listpicker.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript"> $(document).ready(function() { $("select[multiple='multiple']").listpicker(); }); </script>
<form method="post"> <select multiple="multiple" name="data[model][field][]"> <option data-tabs="A" value="1">option 1</option> <option data-tabs="B" value="2" disabled="disabled">option 2</option> <option data-tabs="C" value="3">option 3</option> <option data-tabs="A,C" value="4">option 4</option> <option value="5" selected="selected">option 5</option> </select> <input type="submit"/> </form>
